attributes.title: E=mc^2: Einstein's Equation versus Ancient Vedic Truth: Nithyananda Elaborates
attributes.description: In this discourse taken from Inner Awakening (www.innerawakening.org), living enlightened master and avatar Paramahamsa Nithyananda speaks on the Isa Upanishad's sutra - isa vasyam idam sarvam, which means everything that exists is consciousness. This truth, which was written in the ancient Vedic scriptures by enlightened masters thousands years ago, was proven mathematically by one of the greatest scientists of all time - Albert Einstein as recent as 1905 (for which he later got Nobel Prize). Paramahamsa Nithyananda elaborates on this ancient truth in detail in this discourse from his very experience. Enjoy this enlightening discourse.
